lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova will not compete on grass before Wimbledon for the first time in her career, opting out of playing her usual warm-up tournament in England. Sharapova, hoping to avoid injury, will prepare in Florida rather than compete in the DFS Classic, which starts Monday.
